moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Momo
characters.description: tiny lemur, very cute, loves Aang

moves.name: Chatter
moves.description: Momo makes chattering sounds and annoys his opponent

moves.name: Dizzy Spinny
moves.description: Momo flys in circles above his opponent's head, giving them a bad headache

moves.name: Ear Flaps
moves.description: Momo bats his big ole ears and blows a gust of wind at his opponent

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: Momo hypnotizes his opponent with his big green eyes and gives them shock

new moves.name: Silly Dance
new moves.description: Aang distracts his opponent with his funny antics and then gives them a jab of air in the face
